1.0.name: wordpress/easterwebs
1.0.description:
Using EasterWebs.com you can now create a web easter egg hunt on your site with a few clicks. The prize for finding the easter egg can be one of your products, a gift voucher or anything you decide! You can even connect the egg hunt to your site's content, making it more engaging and adding a unique angle to it.

So what is it all about?

Instead of having another boring prize draw, why not make it fun and create an easter egg hunt on your site, no development necessary, only a few clicks and we'll do the hard work for you! And it doesn't even have to be Easter to give it a go!

You create the egg on EasterWebs.com follow the instructions to enter the egg id into the plugin and the egg appears on your site. Your visitors follow the clues, then enter the answers as a series of key-strokes, clicking on a link, or by certain words appearing on the page.

Clues can be created around the content of the site e.g. "My
